The CEO hastily signs contracts with a weak exponent. Can you recover the signed agreement from this vulnerable implementation? Ciphertext: 0x1ff00efbbb483785bc1255a683906cea806fa75c8316e7ccbee5e291d4984171649bea6b319192a07687425ca4c262f5d6a7f289a0509d6c8641da3f04f35274

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ctm7exfe}
ciphertext: 0x1ff00efbbb483785bc1255a683906cea806fa75c8316e7ccbee5e291d4984171649bea6b319192a07687425ca4c262f5d6a7f289a0509d6c8641da3f04f35274
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (7221749901993142515980967469320867544656688171328348160567676676982827916750658777945691799919041238553745225940713168200599289513845562537812299990790807, 3)
